comments:
Debugging with the IBM 1.3.1 Vm, I sometimes see transisent suspended threads 
and stack frames as "not responding" when I start a debug session. The threads 
then resume and all is fine. There are stack traces in the log like:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 5010 May 25, 2002 15:40:55.132
!MESSAGE com.sun.jdi.InternalException: Got error code in reply: 13 occurred 
retrieving this from stack frame.

I think this might be related to bug# 15212, but a slightly different variety 
of the bug (i.e. a different VM vendor, different timing).

Marking as duplciate - sometimes, "Object" does appear when this happens (all 
depends on timing).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 15212 ***
